channel.title: Client Startup Problem
channel.description:
Everytime i Run thios Client i get this Error [code] C:\Windows\system32>java -Xmx512m -jar SilabClient.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:\Windows\system32>pause Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
What Should I Do

item.title: Client Startup Problem
item.dc:creator: @iTzNoLannn iTzNoLannn
item.description:
@iTzNoLannn wrote:

yep, but its just the Reg. Silab Client. Downloaded. on My Pc My Server Runs On it But for my Laptop I get that Error whenever i run The Client.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Startup Problem

item.description:

Umm you don’t have the right path edit your run.bat file to the right path, right JDK and everything, are you running windows 7?
